description:
For use with MSR® canister stoves, the fuel is clean-burning, 80/20 blend of Isobutane and propane. The short, wide canister provides good stability on uneven surfaces.

  • Fuel maintains pressure from 55psi per gram down to 30psi per gram, so it functions well even as the canister empties
  • Self-sealing Lindal valve
  • Contains 227g of fuel
name: MSR Isopro Fuel 227g Canister
